benchmark_details.name: TCELongBench
benchmark_details.overview: TCELongBench is established to evaluate the proficiency of LLMs in handling temporal dynamics and understanding extensive text through three distinct tasks - reading comprehension, temporal sequencing, and future event forecasting.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of TCELongBench is to evaluate LLMs' capability of temporal and long text understanding.

data.source: Mideast-TE corpus that has identified Temporal Complex Events from GDELT.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model performance on question answering tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy and F1 scores indicate better model performance in understanding Temporal Complex Events.
methodology.baseline_results: Gpt-4-128k outperforms all other models in tasks.
methodology.validation: Human evaluation and multiple rounds of QA verification were conducted.
